p: The amentoflavone molecule coupling with the CYP51 protein, and the spatial conformation with the lowest free energy of -9.39 kcal/mol, showed 15 binding residues (Ser378(A); Leu376(A); Val509(A); Met508(A); His310(A); Gly307(A); Phe228(A); Ile304(A); Phe126(A); Leu300(A); Leu139(A); Ile131(A); Tyr132(A); Tyr118(A); Ile379(A)), with the group HEME (Hem601(A)), performed hydrophobic interactions, and also two hydrogen bonds with residues: Gln142(A), with a distance of 2,65 Å, and Phe380(A), with a distance of 2.75 Å, with a root mean square deviation (RMSD) >2.0 Å [ 44], as shown in Figure 5.
